entries.title: Biden is set to propose higher taxes for the rich. Here's how they work.
entries.description: The taxes on the rich will be announced in President Joe Biden's State of the Union address.

entries.title: Drug-resistant disease will kill millions: UN report
entries.description: Superbugs are now a leading global health risk, according to a major UN report published Tuesday.

entries.title: Prosecution: Woman planned the killings of her 3 children
entries.description: Prosecutors say a Massachusetts woman used exercise bands to strangle her three children in the family home in a well-planned assault while her husband was out for about 20 minutes picking up medicine at a pharmacy and a takeout dinner

entries.title: 2 men arrested in 1975 slaying of Indiana girl, 17
entries.description: State police say two Indiana men have been charged with murder nearly a half-century after a 17-year-old girl was found dead in a river

entries.title: Dudamel to become NY Philharmonic music director, leave LA
entries.description: Gustavo Dudamel will become music director of the New York Philharmonic for the 2026-27 season, ending a tenure with the Los Angeles Philharmonic that began in 2009

entries.title: Prosecutor: XXXTentacion's accused killers set out to rob
entries.description: The trial of three men accused of fatally shooting XXXTentacion is underway with the defense insinuating the rapper Drake may have been involved

entries.title: Inflation fight has a 'long way to go,' Fed chair says
entries.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell cited a strong job market that has defied Fed efforts to cool economy.

entries.title: 7 more Memphis police officers under investigation in Tyre Nichols incident
entries.description: Seven additional Memphis police officers could be disciplined in connection with the Tyre Nichols incident, the city's chief legal officer said.

entries.title: 4 injured after battery catches fire on United flight
entries.description: Four people were taken to the hospital after an external battery caught fire on a United Airlines flight early Tuesday.

entries.title: WATCH:  Navy captures photos of downed Chinese spy balloon
entries.description: The balloon was approximately 200-feet tall and the size of three buses, according to the Pentagon.

entries.title: Fed Chair Powell sees 'significant' inflation drop in 2023
entries.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Tuesday that if the job market further strengthens in the coming months or inflation readings accelerate, the Fed might have to raise its benchmark interest rate higher than it now projects

entries.title: Mexico rejects any effort to reinstate 'remain in Mexico' policy for asylum-seekers
entries.description: Mexico is rejecting any effort to reinstate the Trump-era 'remain in Mexico' policy for asylum-seekers.

entries.title: Celia Cruz makes history as first Afro Latina to appear on the US quarter
entries.description: The Queen of Salsa and Cuban icon Celia Cruz has been selected to appear on the U.S. quarter.

entries.title: Navy releases close-up photos of Chinese surveillance balloon recovery
entries.description: The U.S. Navy has released the first close-up photos of Chinese surveillance balloon recovery operations from Sunday off Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.

entries.title: George Santos' constituents speak out, worry about services: 'Can't take his word'
entries.description: More than a dozen residents and workers in George Santos' district spoke with ABC News about their views on the congressman

entries.title: 15 million people live under threat of glacial floods: Study
entries.description: It's a threat Americans and Europeans rarely think about.

entries.title: Florida mass shooting suspect killed during police pursuit
entries.description: A man suspected in a mass shooting in central Florida was fatally shot by a police officer following a long chase and a carjacking

entries.title: UK police officer, exposed as serial rapist, jailed for life
entries.description: A former London police officer has been sentenced to life in prison with a minimum term of 30 years for raping and sexually assaulting a dozen women over a 17-year period

entries.title: Belgian police detain 25 in Chinese sex trafficking probe
entries.description: Belgian authorities say they have detained 25 people as part of a human trafficking probe targeting an alleged criminal organization suspected of sending Chinese women to Europe and forcing them into prostitution

entries.title: Nigerian politician in UK court over organ-harvesting claims
entries.description: A senior Nigerian politician is on trial in London for allegedly exploiting a street trader by transporting him to the U.K. to donate a kidney in exchange for thousands of pounds

entries.title: Paris mayor: No Russian team at 2024 Games if war continues
entries.description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo says no Russian team should not be allowed to compete at the Paris Olympics next year if Moscow continues its war against Ukraine

entries.title: Overnight rescue dig saves toddler trapped in Thai well
entries.description: An overnight rescue operation has successfully retrieved a 19-month-old girl from a dry artesian well shaft, 18 hours after she fell into the hole at a cassava farm in northern Thailand

entries.title: WATCH:  Dolphins join paddleboarder in crystal-clear waters
entries.description: A paddleboarder captured the moment a pod of dolphins joined him in the crystal-clear waters of the Pacific Ocean off the coast of Southern California.

entries.title: Lebanese banks close doors to customers to protest ruling
entries.description: Lebanon’s battered commercial banks have closed their doors to customers in protest of a recent court ruling that forced one of the country’s largest banks to pay out two of its depositors their trapped savings in cash

entries.title: WATCH:  Dog enjoys carrying gigantic sticks
entries.description: A New Jersey dog is taking literally the expression “speak softly and carry a big stick."

entries.title: French protesters hold more strikes over pension changes
entries.description: Public transportation, schools and electricity, oil and gas supplies are disrupted in France as demonstrators were to take to the streets for a third round of nationwide strikes and protests against the government’s pension reform plans

entries.title: Japan shows tough new security moves during Philippines trip
entries.description: Growing worry over Chinese threats has led to a major Japanese boost in military spending, defense partnerships and aid packages

entries.title: Ohio train derailment: Residents forced to evacuate not yet allowed to return home
entries.description: Residents near the Ohio-Pennsylvania state line who were told to evacuate after tanker cars derailed in a fiery crash have still not been allowed to return home.

entries.title: Biden to deliver State of the Union address before empowered GOP
entries.description: President Biden deliver his second State of the Union address before an empowered GOP and before he's expected to announce whether he'll run for reelection.

entries.title: 2 pilots walk away from Boeing 737 tanker crash in Australia
entries.description: Two pilots have walked away with minor injuries after a Boeing 737 jet converted for firefighting crashed in Australia

entries.title: $754.6 million Powerball jackpot won by a single ticket
entries.description: One person in Washington has won the Powerball jackpot prize of $754.6 million -- the fifth-largest Powerball jackpot and ninth-largest U.S. lottery jackpot in history.

entries.title: Civil rights groups seek halt to Missouri execution
entries.description: Missouri Gov. Mike Parson will not grant clemency and halt the execution of Raheem Taylor, who faces lethal injection for the deaths his girlfriend and her three children

entries.title: Potential debt ceiling standoff looms large over State of the Union
entries.description: When Joe Biden delivers his State of the Union address with Kevin McCarthy over his shoulder, looming between the two will be a possible standoff over the debt ceiling

entries.title: Generators, spoiled food: Slow power repairs anger Austin
entries.description: The future of Austin’s top city executive plunged into jeopardy Monday as outrage boiled over power outages that have left thousands of people without electricity in the Texas capital for nearly a week and are likely to drag on for days longer

entries.title: Google announces new AI program named Bard
entries.description: If you ever needed artificial intelligence's help to plan a friend's baby shower, your time has come, as Google officially unveiled an AI program it's calling Bard.

entries.title: Arrest made after off-duty NYPD officer shot: Police sources
entries.description: A 38-year-old man suspected of shooting an off-duty NYPD officer was arrested Monday, sources close to the investigation told ABC News.
